sys_script_include.description: Database Insertion of creating new records in the table
sys_script_include.name: InsertRecords

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_ac8674a02fc50110c0bd57892799b669
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_722259_sn_test_d.InsertRecords</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Database Insertion of creating new records in the table</description><name>InsertRecords</name><script><![CDATA[var InsertRecords = Class.create();
InsertRecords.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    createDemoRecords: function(tableName, numberOfRecords) {

        var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        for (var i = 1; i <= numberOfRecords; i++) {
            gr.initialize();
            gr.short_description = 'Trial ' + i + ' from SN Test Data Application';
            gr.description = 'This is a demo trial ticket from background Script targeting the description field.';
            //gr.setWorkflow(false);
            gr.insert();

        }
    },

    type: 'InsertRecords'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>niamul.arifin@cdw.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-11 06:04:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>ac8674a02fc50110c0bd57892799b669</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>InsertRecords</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SN Test Data Application" source="x_722259_sn_test_d">c285035c2f010110c0bd57892799b6b8</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SN Test Data Application">c285035c2f010110c0bd57892799b6b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ac8674a02fc50110c0bd57892799b669</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>niamul.arifin@cdw.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-11 06:07:58</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
